contents: Article 2 (Definition) The meanings of terms used in these regulations are as follows. 1. Membership means joining as a member organization of the Korea Sports Council (hereinafter referred to as *Sports Council) by resolution of the board of directors or general meeting of delegates. 2. Withdrawal refers to a member organization terminating its membership relationship. 3. Grade refers to the classification of member organizations in accordance with each subparagraph of Article 7, Paragraph 3 of the Articles of Incorporation. 4. Promotion means that an associate member organization is adjusted to a regular member organization, or a recognized organization is adjusted to an associate member organization. 5. Demotion means that a regular member organization is adjusted to an associate member organization or a recognized organization, or an associate member organization is adjusted to a recognized organization. 6. Expulsion refers to the Sports Association depriving a member organization of its qualifications. 7. Olympic Games events and Asian Games events refer to events adopted for the Olympic Games or Asian Games at the time of membership and rating deliberation.
